overview: The video evidence of the murder, which is especially brutal and graphic that shouldn't release to the public.  A reporter who has access to the prosecutor's office hears about a cursed tape in the video archive and begins reporting on it. As he digs into the background of the tape, he and his team uncover tidbits of records and find links to various cases. But as they dig deeper and deeper, mysterious events take place all around them.
tagline: There was a reason why it couldn't be released.
title: Marui Video
